CASH_ITEM.NAME: Tent
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Save your current Dungeon level progress.|The next time you visit the Dungeon,|you can continue from where you left off.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Magical Silver Watch
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: This item will cut the current training time in half!|This item can be used multiple times in a single|training period.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Advanced Training Room Key
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Unlocks the Advanced Classroom.|(This is a single-use item)

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Advanced Gym Key
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Unlocks the Advanced Gym and increases|the success rate of your next upgrade.|(This is a single-use item)

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Magical Golden Watch
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: This item will double your effective exploration|time. It will appear in Exploration Equipment|when purchased.|Usable once per exploration.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Book
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Raises Wisdom. (500 max)|[Recommended reading, but by whom?]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Book Set
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Greatly raises Wisdom. (500 max)|[7,000,000 Habits of Highly Effective People]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Rose
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Raises Sensitivity. (500 max)|[A token of love, or something like it.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Rose Bouquet
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Greatly raises Sensitivity. (500 max)|[Does this mean "I love you" or "I'm sorry"?]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Headband
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Raises Personality. (500 max)|[Simple, but charming.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Cat Ears
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Greatly raises Personality. (500 max)|[Mew can't go wrong with a classic.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Panties
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Raises Glamour. (500 max)|[Don't leave home without it.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Underwear Set
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Greatly raises Glamour. (500 max)|[Overwear set not included.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Toy Mallet
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Lowers Wisdom.|[Squeak!]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Work Gloves
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Lowers Sensitivity.|[Overuse may result in dullness.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Sweatpants
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Lowers Personality.|[To the unambitious, comfy and easy to wear.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Afro Wig
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Lowers Glamour.|[We won't ask. We don't want to know.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Parfait
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Greatly raises Wisdom, Sensitivity,|Personality, or Glamour. (500 max)|[Surprise Parfait with surprise ingredients.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Gold Ring
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Raises Liking.|[How precious!]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Diamond Ring
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Greatly raises Liking.|[And they said money can't buy you love.]

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Vita Starter Deck
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Vita Starter Deck,|with 10 bonus Cat Dolls and 10 bonus Books.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Academy Starter Deck
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Academy Starter Deck,|with 10 bonus Cat Dolls and 10 bonus Books.

CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Crux Starter Deck,|with 10 bonus Cat Dolls and 10 bonus Books.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Council Theme Deck
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Council-themed Vita Deck with exclusive |Council VP Tieria, Double Council Kick Spell, |and Council Press Student cards.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Maid Theme Deck
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Maid-themed Academy Deck with exclusive |Maid Lesnoa, Comfort Room, |and Producer Maid cards.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Seeker Theme Deck
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Seeker-themed Crux Deck with exclusive |Seeker Odien, Flash Shield, |and Seeker Irene cards.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Witch Theme Deck
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Witch-themed Darklore Deck with exclusive |Lightning Palomporom, Strega Think Tank, |and Artisan Baker Witch cards.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: The key of Girl's room
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: This item allows your Characters| to explore the Girl's room.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Ore Certificate
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: This lets you perform another|20 Ore transmutations.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Accessories Certificate
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: This lets you perform another|20 Accessory transmutations.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Magical Map
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: This item allows your Character to explore|the Magical Forest.|(This is a single-use item)

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Relic
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Prevent one Follower from being consumed|during upgrading. This can only be used on|Followers with STVL. 1 or higher.

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Blessed Relic
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: Prevent one Follower from being consumed|during upgrading. This can only be used on|Followers with STVL. 1 or higher.|(Also unlocks the Advanced Gym)

CASH_ITEM.NAME: Slot Key
CASH_ITEM.TEXT: This item gives you another Deck Slot.|You can have up to 10 Decks.|
